description: Managed by a private host
Located in the peaceful Courtoisville district, 150 metres from the beach and 5 minutes from the thermal baths, the Brit Hotel offers charming rooms equipped with free Wi-Fi internet access.
Managed by a private host
Résidence Quai Sud- Le Charcot offers pet-friendly accommodation in Saint Malo, just 50 metres from Sillon Beach and a few steps from Espace Duguay Trouin.
Résidence Quai Sud-Le Bourdonnais is a self-catering accommodation located in Saint Malo, a few steps away from the beach and 500 m from Intra-Muros, the historical centre of Saint-Malo.
Managed by a private host
The Oceania Saint Malo hotel faces the sea and is located on Chaussée du Sillon, opposite Sillon Beach and 450 metres from Saint-Malo Marina.
Set in Saint Malo, just 500 metres from the old town, this apartment features free WiFi and a balcony. The property is a few steps from Espace Duguay Trouin and free private parking is available.
Offering free WiFi and free private parking, Le 1684 is located in Saint Malo, within just 400 metres of Eventail Beach.
Set in the historical centre of Saint-Malo, this 4-star hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the cathedral and 120 metres from Saint-Malo Marina.
Le Valmarin is a 18th-century Malouinière, enclosed in a 3000 m² tree-lined park. It is located a 5-minute walk from the beaches of Saint-Malo. The property offers free Wi-Fi internet access.
Les Lauriers - dans l'Intramuros in Saint Malo offers accommodation with free WiFi, 200 metres from Bon Secours Beach, 300 metres from Mole Beach and 700 metres from Eventail Beach.
Managed by a private host
Located in Saint Malo, this apartment is 30 metres from the beach and 600 metres from the town centre. The apartment is 250 metres from Ferry Terminal du Naye and a 4-minute walk from a public pool.
Offering a snack bar and free WiFi, ibis Styles Saint Malo Port is located in Saint Malo, less than a 10-minute walk from the sandy beaches and 1 km from Saint-Malo Train Station.
Logement de charme - Saint-Malo intramuros in Saint Malo features accommodation with free WiFi, 200 metres from Bon Secours Beach, 400 metres from Mole Beach and 700 metres from Eventail Beach.
Set in a property originally built in the 16th century, Hotel des Abers is situated in central Saint Malo, 400 metres from Saint-Malo Casino and 500 metres from Cale de Dinan Ferry.
Managed by a private host
Situated in Saint Malo, 400 metres from Bas-Sablons Beach, Solidor appartement St Malo vue sur mer proche FERRY features accommodation with a casino, free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.
The 17th-century Manoir Du Cunningham is located on the seafront, just a 10-minute walk from the Old Town in Saint-Malo. It offers rooms and suites with flat-screen TV and radio.
Set in Saint Malo, just 300 metres from Bon Secours Beach, Le Pilo offers beachfront accommodation with free WiFi.
Managed by a private host
Situated in Saint Malo, 300 metres from Rochebonne Beach and 500 metres from Minihic Beach, Rochebonne Plage features accommodation with free WiFi and a garden with a barbecue and garden views.
Best Western Alexandra is a hotel with direct access to the beach in Saint Malo, and offers sweeping views over the beach and sea.
Managed by a private host
